product_name: Oboz Sawtooth Low Hiking Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With rugged outsoles and athletic, low-cut design, the women's Oboz Sawtooth Low Cross-Training Shoes deliver lightweight performance for all your off-road pursuits. Nubuck leather uppers feature abrasion-resistant nylon mesh panels for just the right combination of protection and breathability. Nylon mesh linings wick moisture, dry quickly and further enhance breathability. Molded EVA footbeds and dual-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning. Nylon shanks offer torsional stability and protection underfoot, ensuring a smooth stride and reducing rock bruising. Oboz Sawtooth Low Cross-Training Shoes have aggressively lugged outsoles with durable, sticky rubber for exceptional grip in all directions, on both wet and dry surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: With rugged outsoles and athletic, low-cut design, the women's Oboz Sawtooth Low Cross-Training Shoes deliver lightweight performance for all your off-road pursuits.
